title: Alesha Dixon looks thrilled at America’s Got Talent after giving birth
text:
Alesha has lots to smile about right now (Picture: Splash News)

Alesha Dixon looked all kinds of radiant as she made her way to work on America’s Got Talent, hours before confirming she had quietly given birth to her second child seven weeks ago.

The TV personality was seen arriving at the filming location in Pasadena on Sunday for the upcoming season of AGT: The Champions, with her five-year-old daughter Azura Sienna by her side.

There was no sign that Alesha had given birth less than two months ago but she did look particularly giddy, smiling widely for the cameras she strolled hand-in-hand with her eldest child.

Alesha, who turns 41 today, joined co-judge Heidi Klum at the shoot and, once inside, put little Azura to work with the youngster seen sitting at the judge’s table and excitedly pressing the buzzer.

If Alesha ever wants a break, we’d be happy to see Azura step in to fill her mother’s shoes.

Little did we know that Alesha had secretly given birth to her second child seven weeks ago.

In a sweet Instagram post on Monday morning, the Britain’s Got Talent judge shared the first photo of her baby girl Anaya Safiya, who was born on 20 August.

Little Azura looked ready for business (Picture: Splash News)

Alesha’s got that new mum glow about her (Picture: GC Images)

The BGT judge is now a mum of two (Picture: Mega)

The photo shows the adorable newborn comfortably resting on the chest of her father and Alesha’s husband Azuka Ononye.

‘7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet,’ Alesha wrote in the caption.

Alesha was flooded with congratulatory messages from her celebrity peers and her BGT co-judge Amanda Holden led the way, writing: ‘So glad it’s finally out there!! The best news ever. I was bursting. Happy birthday Wifey.’

Aston Merrygold commented: ‘That face, happy birthday hun,’ while Fleur East enthused: ‘Aww! Beautiful! Congratulations to you both.’

Giovanna Fletcher, wife of McFly singer Tom Fletcher, said: ‘Oh my!!! What a BEAUTY!! Huge congratulations.’

And Kate Thornton added: ‘A thousand congratulations, she is delicious.’

Welcome to the world little Anaya.
